meta.name: description
meta.content: The 5th largest school distict in Georgia committed to serving over 50,000 diverse students just south of metro Atlanta.

nav.div: CCPS » Departments » Human Resources » Families First Coronavirus Response Act

span.style: font-size: 15px; letter-spacing: normal; white-space: pre-line; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252); font-family: "Open Sans"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: The Families First Coronavirus Response Act (FFCRA) is effective as of April 1, 2020. The act covers paid sick leave and expanded family and medical leave. Please see the attachment for more information. Employee Rights- English Version Employee Rights- Spanish Version

The U.S. Department of Labor has created the attached poster in additional languages. Please click on the link below and scroll down to the “Posters” heading.
https://www.dol.gov/agencies/whd/ffcra

span.style: color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: "Open Sans"; font-size: 15px; font-style: italic; letter-spacing: normal; white-space: pre-line; background-color: rgb(252, 252, 252);

div.span:
© 2020 Clayton County Public Schools
Clayton County Public Schools (CCPS) does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in employment, admission to its programs,
services, or activities, access to any of the above, treatment of individuals, or any aspect of its operations.
View the 504 Child Find Statement here. Powered by Presence.
